fields.description: Unique system ID for this membership subscription.
fields.label: Membership Number

fields.description: Select the member/client subscribing to this package.
fields.label: Member

fields.description: The specific membership plan being purchased.
fields.label: Package

fields.description: Current lifecycle status (e.g., Active or Paused for vacations).
fields.label: Status

fields.description: Activation date of the membership.
fields.label: Start Date

fields.description: Expiration date of the membership.
fields.label: End Date

fields.description: Date the membership was temporarily suspended.
fields.label: Pause Start

fields.description: Date the membership is set to resume.
fields.label: Pause End

fields.description: Explanation for the temporary suspension.
fields.label: Pause Reason

fields.description: Standard price of the selected package.
fields.label: Package Price

fields.description: Percentage discount applied to the price.
fields.label: Discount Percent

fields.description: Fixed currency value of the discount.
fields.label: Discount Amount

fields.description: Price after all discounts (Package Price - Discount).
fields.label: Final Price

fields.description: The promotion code used for this sale.
fields.label: Promo Code

fields.description: Access limit type (e.g., Daily, Monthly, Unlimited).
fields.label: Access Type

fields.description: Total visits allowed per period.
fields.label: Total Access Allowed

fields.description: Number of times the member has entered the facility.
fields.label: Access Used

fields.description: Calculated visits remaining.
fields.label: Access Remaining

fields.description: Unused visits brought forward from a previous period.
fields.label: Rollover From Previous

fields.description: The last recorded check-in date.
fields.label: Last Access Date

fields.description: Total meeting room hours included in this package.
fields.label: Meeting Hours Allowed

fields.description: Meeting room hours consumed to date.
fields.label: Meeting Hours Used

fields.description: Free guest passes included in the plan.
fields.label: Guest Passes Allowed

fields.description: Guest passes already redeemed.
fields.label: Guest Passes Used

fields.description: Black & white or color page limit.
fields.label: Printing Pages Allowed

fields.description: Total pages printed to date.
fields.label: Printing Pages Used

fields.description: Enable to automatically create the next membership on expiration.
fields.label: Auto Renew

fields.description: Indicates if the system has sent a notice to the member.
fields.label: Renewal Reminder Sent

fields.description: Reference to the previous membership record.
fields.label: Renewed From

fields.description: Reference to the new membership record.
fields.label: Renewed To
